title: Study of The Possibility of Applying Intellectual Methods in Creating Risk Analysis Decision Support System in The Socio-Economic Sphere
abstract: In the context of the socio-economic development of the world economy, as well as improvements in the field of automation of risk analysis and assessment processes intelligent methods are used more often. The article explores the possibility of creating a risk analysis decision support system using modern intelligent methods. Creating a decision support system in this area is a complex process, but it is also important and valuable in the context of the transition to a digital economy. The possibility of creating an algorithm for dynamic risk analysis under uncertainty taking into account the obtained unstructured information is described. The modern intelligent methods applied to the development of decision support system in the socioeconomic sphere are investigated. We propose using the methods of cognitive visualization in the transformation of the results of risk analysis into a graphical form, which simplifies the evaluation and analysis of the received information.
